message: Let's start with this. A large portion for me, but I'm open to negotiation.
I think a 60-40 split is more fair, considering we're equal players in this game.

I see we're getting closer. A 55-45 split seems reasonable, considering we've both shown willingness to compromise.
Bob, we're getting close!  I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. Let's settle this and both walk away happy.
